contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 3, 1995 D Fife Charities Band Association Contest
Fife Charities Band Association Contest 1 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest (Separate Points) Fife Charities Band Association Contest fife-charities-band-association-contest
None
Adam Smith Theatre, Kirkcaldy, Fife, Scotland, UK Open Contest Champions: Cowdenbeath FCBA 'A Band' Champions: Cowdenbeath FCBA 'B Band' Champions: Dunfermline Town
March: Longannet Colliery (Cowdenbeath). Hymn-tune: Kelty and Blairadam. Best Section 2 band: Longannet Colliery (Cowdenbeath). Best Section 3 band: Campbeltown Brass (G. Evans). Best Section 4 band: West Calder District (H. Foster). Best cornet player: Morvern Gilchrist (Campbeltown Brass). Best trombone player: David Cook (Longannet Colliery). Best horn: Shona Spence (Tullis Russell). Best euphonium: Steve Boyce (Kelty and Blairadam). Best basses: Longannet Colliery. Special permanent awards were made to both Longannet Colliery (Cowdenbeath) and Campbeltown Brass.
March 21, 2011, 10:52 p.m. March 23, 2015, 2:06 p.m.
1 Longannet Colliery (Cowdenbeath) Thomas Wyss The Year of the Dragon
2 Kelty & Blairadam Band Richard Duff
3 Tullis Russell Mills Benny Davis
Unknown Result Campbeltown Brass Gordon Evans
Unknown Result Dunfermline Town Carlo Madden Triptych [Sparke]
Unknown Result West Calder Public Band Hugh Foster
